comments:
This is how I can reproduce the error in my environment:

- create an J2EE EAR 5.0 project
- check "Generate Deployment Descriptor"
- create an EJB 3.0 project and assign it to the EAR created above
- check "Create an EJB Client JAR module to hold the client interfaces and classes."
- check "Generate Deployment Descriptor"
- close Eclipse and restart it
- the NPE will be thrown after a few seconds

Eclipse SDK Build is the most recent SDK 3.3.1.1 downloaded from the Eclipse site.

Environment:
eclipse.buildId=M20071023-1652
java.version=1.5.0_12
java.vendor=BEA Systems, Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=linux, ARCH=x86, WS=gtk, NL=en_US
Command-line arguments:  -os linux -ws gtk -arch x86

Message:
"An internal error occurred during: "Initializing Java Tooling"."

Stacktrace:
